mil3.1.8:2.6: “Vāmena, bhante, hatthena yavakalāpaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena dāttaṃ gahetvā dāttena chindantī”ti.
mil3.1.8:3.1: “Yathā, mahārāja, yavalāvako vāmena hatthena yavakalāpaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena dāttaṃ gahetvā yavaṃ chindati;
mil3.1.8:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yogāvacaro manasikārena mānasaṃ gahetvā paññāya kilese chindati, evaṃ kho, mahārāja, ūhanalakkhaṇo manasikāro, evaṃ chedanalakkhaṇā paññā”ti.
